name: Mandala #2 - Monochrome
description: “We experience the seamless, unimpeded flow of everything that arises and dissolves within the reality-sphere that is the mandala of our own existence. Nothing is out of place; everything gives unique expression to an infinite network of conditions that are implicated in every manifestation from the most minuscule to the most cosmic, from the most insignificant to the most magnificent.” – Peter Fenner | Format: PNG at 8001 x 8001 pixels. | Handmade with Illustrator.
